headline.main: Dallas, Republican Party, Britain: Your Monday Evening Briefing

docs.snippet: Here’s what you need to know at the end of the day....

byline.original: By ANDREA KANNAPELL and SANDRA STEVENSON

docs.lead_paragraph: Here’s what you need to know at the end of the day.

headline.main: Tesla Says It Hasn't Been Informed of SEC Investigation
headline.print_headline: Tesla Says It Hasn't Been Informed of SEC Investigation

docs.snippet: Electric car maker Tesla Motors says it hasn't been informed of a government investigation into its disclosure of a fatal crash....
docs.lead_paragraph: Electric car maker Tesla Motors says it hasn't been informed of a government investigation into its disclosure of a fatal crash.

headline.main: Half Europeans Fear, Resent Refugees: Survey
headline.print_headline: Half Europeans Fear, Resent Refugees: Survey

docs.snippet: About half of Europeans fear the arrival of refugees raises the risk of attacks in their countries, a survey published on Monday found, and many, especially in the east, see them as a burden on their economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: About half of Europeans fear the arrival of refugees raises the risk of attacks in their countries, a survey published on Monday found, and many, especially in the east, see them as a burden on their economy.

headline.main: House Chairmen Seek New Federal Probe of Clinton Testimony
headline.print_headline: House Chairmen Seek New Federal Probe of Clinton Testimony

docs.snippet: The Republican chairmen of two U.S. House of Representatives committees asked the Justice Department on Monday to launch an investigation into whether Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton committed perjury during testimony to Congress...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Republican chairmen of two U.S. House of Representatives committees asked the Justice Department on Monday to launch an investigation into whether Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton committed perjury during testimony to Congress about her use of a private email server.

headline.main: Survey: Europeans Worry Migrants May Increase Terror Threat
headline.print_headline: Survey: Europeans Worry Migrants May Increase Terror Threat

docs.snippet: The refugee crisis and the threat of terrorism in Europe are very much related to one another in the minds of many Europeans, according to a survey conducted across the continent....
docs.lead_paragraph: The refugee crisis and the threat of terrorism in Europe are very much related to one another in the minds of many Europeans, according to a survey conducted across the continent.

headline.main: Dallas Police Had Taken Steps to Mend Rift With Minorities
headline.print_headline: Dallas Police Had Taken Steps to Mend Rift With Minorities

docs.snippet: When Micah Johnson opened fire on Dallas police in an act of vengeance against white officers, he was attacking a department whose chief has been lauded across the country for taking bold steps to root out bad cops and repair relations with minori...
docs.lead_paragraph: When Micah Johnson opened fire on Dallas police in an act of vengeance against white officers, he was attacking a department whose chief has been lauded across the country for taking bold steps to root out bad cops and repair relations with minorities.

headline.main: Judge Allows Bundy Brothers to Be Reunited at Oregon Jail
headline.print_headline: Judge Allows Bundy Brothers to Be Reunited at Oregon Jail

docs.snippet: Ammon and Ryan Bundy will be reunited at a downtown Portland jail as they prepare their defense on charges related to the armed occupation of an Oregon bird sanctuary, a judge ruled Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ammon and Ryan Bundy will be reunited at a downtown Portland jail as they prepare their defense on charges related to the armed occupation of an Oregon bird sanctuary, a judge ruled Monday.

headline.main: IMF Says Italy Faces 'Monumental Challenge', Cuts Growth Outlook
headline.print_headline: IMF Says Italy Faces 'Monumental Challenge', Cuts Growth Outlook

docs.snippet: Italy's economy will grow by less than one percent this year and only marginally faster in 2017, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday, cutting its previous forecasts as a result of Britain's decision to leave the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy's economy will grow by less than one percent this year and only marginally faster in 2017, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday, cutting its previous forecasts as a result of Britain's decision to leave the European Union.

headline.main: House GOP Request Investigation of Clinton Over Emails
headline.print_headline: House GOP Request Investigation of Clinton Over Emails

docs.snippet: House Republicans on Monday formally asked the Justice Department to investigate Hillary Clinton and determine whether she lied to Congress, a fresh challenge certain to shadow the Democratic presidential candidate....
docs.lead_paragraph: House Republicans on Monday formally asked the Justice Department to investigate Hillary Clinton and determine whether she lied to Congress, a fresh challenge certain to shadow the Democratic presidential candidate.

headline.main: Suspect in San Diego Homeless Killings Is Freed, No Charges
headline.print_headline: Suspect in San Diego Homeless Killings Is Freed, No Charges

docs.snippet: A homeless man who police had identified as the sole suspect in a spate of attacks on transients that left three dead was released from jail Monday and not charged with any crimes, keeping alive the search for an attacker who strikes victims when ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A homeless man who police had identified as the sole suspect in a spate of attacks on transients that left three dead was released from jail Monday and not charged with any crimes, keeping alive the search for an attacker who strikes victims when they are sleeping alone and sometimes sets them on fire.
